expo.name: ReMap
expo.description: Your Interactive Memory Atlas - Transform experiences into an interactive, personal atlas while letting you discover authentic stories from others

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ReMap needs location access to pin your memories to specific places and help you discover stories from your current location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: ReMap uses your location to create an interactive memory atlas based on where your experiences happened.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ReMap needs camera access to capture photos for your memory pins and visual storytelling.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ReMap needs photo library access to let you choose existing photos for your memories.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ReMap to use your location to create location-based memories and discover nearby stories.
